welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wald-Michelbach, a charming town nestled in the beautiful Odenwald region. Known for its picturesque scenery and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore and experience the unique charm of our town. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
